r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.5M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Aspen Pharmacare Canada. The average
  contract duration was 1.3 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $3.2M. The longest
  contract was 1.3 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.2M.
lookup_name: 'ASPEN PHARMACARE CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '2.5M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-35%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'

s424_mean_duration: '1.3'
s421_mean_contract_value: '3.2M'
s425_max_duration: '1.3'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.2M'
